value: What do I look like, an Orc?
This is not Warcraft in space!
What would you ask of me?
For the Khala is my strength!
I don't have time for games!
I was Executor long before you!
So do not try my patience!
You have persecuted us for generations...
...and now you beg us to aid you?
We will do what we must...
...but we do it for Aiur, not you...
We sense a soul in search of answers.
Do you seek knowledge of time travel?
We'll take that as a yes.
And now for your first lesson. (creepy laughing)
(rapid backwards replay of the previous lines) Do you seek knowledge of time travel?
Recall 1.
Recall 2.
Recall 3.
Recall 4.
Stasis Field.
It all looks so different on this side.
Archon Warp.
Command, or you will be relieved!
This is not an idle threat!
It is a good day to die. (Warcraft II cheat code.)
I thought you'd see it my way.
Look at all the pretty lights!
I wonder what this button does. (beep, followed by sirens)
(siren blaring steadilly) I think this was a BIG mistake.
(radio playing in background)(singing badly) When the moon... is in the seventh house...
(radio playing in background)(singing badly still) And Jupiter... is... umm...
(radio playing in background, followed by mysterious flare) Zefram Cochrane, is that you?
(radio playing in background) What did you do to your hair?
Disruption Web.
Dark Archon Warp.
Feedback.
Maelstrom.
Mind Control.
Do not provoke me to violence.
You could no more evade my wrath...
Dark Archon Warp.
(warning beep) Drop your weapon! You have 15 seconds to comply.
Five... Four... Three. Two. One! (fires phase disruptor)
I see you have an appetite for destruction.
And you have learned to use your illusion.
But I find your lack of control disturbing.
Archon Warp.
Hallucination 1.
Hallucination 2.
Psionic storm 1.
Psionic storm 2.
(static)(voice of Adria) I sense a soul in search of answers.
(static)(Voice of Griswold) That sounds like a... a HUGE, GARGANTUAN, SWOLLEN, BLOATED MUSHROOM!
(static)(voice of Neil Armstrong) One small step for a man, one giant- (harsh static)(voice of Orc Grunt) STOP POKING MEEEE!
(static)("Medieval Man" playing, [1]) In the age of chaos, two factions battle for dominance.
(static)(German advertisement for Warcraft II and its expansion set)
Doom to all who threaten the homeworld!
